title: Jirrupin Bunggul 'Happy Dance'
brief_description: Winner of the ‘Make a stamp come alive’ category of Screen It! This cool little work combines a thumping dance track with animation of the artwork depicted on an Australian stamp entitled ‘Aboriginal Culture: Music and Dance’. An animated short entered to ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
